revised_title: The Distinctive Characteristics of Sepia and Vermes Testacea Ova
topics: Reproduction and Development in Sepia and Vermes Testacea
tldr: The author examines the distinguishing characteristics between the ova of the Sepia and Vermes Testacea, focusing on their reproductive and developmental processes. The study reveals that Sepia ova are not formed by an animal of the order Vermes Testacea, and that the Sepia uses a different method of egg formation and defense for its young.
